item.title: Brief history of complex poles
item.description: According to these pages http://jeff560.tripod.com the word ‘pole’ was first used in Théorie des fonctions elliptiques. English translation (of course using google), “When u is holomorphic function in a certain part of the plan, except at a point z1, where it becomes infinite, so however that the function remains 1/u holomorphic in the neighborhood of this point, we say that this is a pole or infinite the function u.” In their memoirs they have mentioned that pole is ‘un infini du degré fini’- An infinity of finite degree.
